name: find a focus
description:
- when is this applicable?
 - do we do this on actuators?
 - what is the role of actuators in the higher sense?
 - is it moving tank treads? isn't that always allowed?
 - is it moving to an adjacent room? how does that mesh with the greater context?
 - basically, are actuators learnable to? to what level of complexity (in terms of hierarchy planning)?

Is this when we get rid of apriori knowledge? Then the actuators will be simple and "always available". Then we need to learn how they interact with the world in the larger context of the world.
Do we need to introduce hierarchy planning now? To separate out the actuators from the abstract world so we can learn about the world?
